item.title: Road Marking and Street Lighting
item.description: Road traffic crashes are one of the world’s largest public health and injury prevention problems. The problem is all the more acute because the victims are overwhelmingly healthy prior to their crashes. According to the World Health Organization (WHO), more than a million people are killed on the world’s roads each year. I am writing this article to make you well acquainted with street safety factors and how street lights and markings will cause a relief from grief of a family.
